001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.chain;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.log.LogQuest;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.Quest;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.SuperQuest;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.retry.RetryCondition;
007import io.cyborgcode.utilities.reflections.RetryUtils;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.AssertionResult;
009import io.qameta.allure.Allure;
010import java.time.Duration;
011import java.util.List;
012import org.assertj.core.api.Assertions;
013
014/**
015 * Provides a base implementation for fluent service interactions.
016 *
017 * <p>This class serves as a foundation for fluent service execution,
018 * offering retry mechanisms, validation handling, and structured
019 * test execution flow.
020 *
021 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
022 */
023public class FluentService implements FluentChain {
024
025   /**
026    * The {@code SuperQuest} instance managing the test execution context.
027    */
028   protected SuperQuest quest;
029
030   /**
031    * Retrieves the original quest instance for further execution.
032    *
033    * @return The original {@code Quest} instance.
034    */
035   @Override
036   public Quest drop() {
037      LogQuest.info("The quest has dropped the ring.");
038      return quest.getOriginal();
039   }
040
041   /**
042    * Executes a retry mechanism until a specified condition is met.
043    *
044    * @param retryCondition The retry condition to be checked.
045    * @param maxWait        The maximum duration to wait before giving up.
046    * @param retryInterval  The interval between retries.
047    * @param service        The service instance used in the retry condition.
048    * @param <T>            The type used in the retry condition function.
049    * @return The current {@code FluentService} instance for method chaining.
050    */
051   protected <T> FluentService retryUntil(RetryCondition<T> retryCondition, Duration maxWait,
052         Duration retryInterval, Object service) {
053      RetryUtils.retryUntil(maxWait, retryInterval, () -> retryCondition.function().apply(service),
054            retryCondition.condition());
055      return this;
056   }
057
058   /**
059    * Assigns a {@code SuperQuest} instance to this service.
060    *
061    * @param quest The {@code SuperQuest} instance to be assigned.
062    */
063   protected void setQuest(final SuperQuest quest) {
064      this.quest = quest;
065   }
066
067   /**
068    * Performs validation on a list of assertion results.
069    *
070    * <p>This method logs, reports, and evaluates assertions, supporting both
071    * soft and hard validations.
072    *
073    * @param assertionResults The list of assertion results to be validated.
074    */
075   @SuppressWarnings("java:S5960")
076   protected void validation(List<AssertionResult<Object>> assertionResults) {
077      assertionResults.forEach(assertionResult -> {
078         String message = assertionResult.toString();
079         LogQuest.validation(message);
080         Allure.step(message);
081
082         boolean isPassed = assertionResult.isPassed();
083         if (assertionResult.isSoft()) {
084            quest.getSoftAssertions()
085                  .assertThat(isPassed)
086                  .as(message)
087                  .isTrue();
088         } else {
089            Assertions.assertThat(isPassed)
090                  .as(message)
091                  .isTrue();
092         }
093      });
094   }
095
096   /**
097    * Hook method for initializing any required setup after a quest is configured.
098    *
099    * <p>This method can be overridden by subclasses to provide custom setup logic.
100    */
101   protected void postQuestSetupInitialization() {
102      //can override for specific services
103   }
104
105}
